heroSubtitle: Experience the best nail care services with us.

appointment.title: Effortless Appointments
appointment.description: Manage your appointments with ease using our simple and reliable scheduling system. Stay organized, on time, and never miss a booking.

support.title: 24/7 Vietnamese Support
support.description: We provide round-the-clock support in Vietnamese, ensuring you have help whenever you need it to keep your business running smoothly.

dataOwnership.title: You Own Your Data
dataOwnership.description: You control what you save in the system, ensuring the highest level of privacy and security. Your business, your rules.
